entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of rain mixed with light wet snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
